segments.text: The kitchen looks typical, with the woman at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and towel, going about her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is running, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over steadily onto the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool before the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unsteady, legs not flat on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the mischief makes me smile, kids being kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm extended toward the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a neat garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter to the right, neatly stacked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a lively domestic moment unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
